statements: SELECT * FROM children_health_records WHERE child_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT child_name, parent_name FROM children_health_records WHERE birthdate > '2010-01-01';
SELECT child_id, parent_name, vaccination_records FROM children_health_records WHERE child_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM children_health_records ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT child_id, child_name, birthdate FROM children_health_records WHERE vaccination_records ->> 'vaccine_name' = 'MMR';
SELECT child_id, child_name, parent_name, birthdate, vaccination_records FROM children_health_records WHERE child_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT child_name, parent_name, birthdate FROM children_health_records WHERE parent_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM children_health_records ORDER BY child_name ASC;
SELECT child_id, child_name, parent_name FROM children_health_records WHERE vaccination_records @> '{"vaccine": "MMR"}' AND birthdate < '2010-01-01';
SELECT child_id, parent_name FROM children_health_records WHERE child_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY child_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM children_health_records;
SELECT child_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM children_health_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT child_name, health_conditions FROM children_health_records WHERE health_conditions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT child_name, date_of_birth, guardian_name FROM children_health_records ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT vaccination_name, vaccination_date, vaccination_location FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccination_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT child_id, child_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM public.children_health_records ORDER BY child_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM public.children_health_records WHERE gender='Male' AND date_of_birth >= '2010-01-01';
SELECT child_name, guardian_name, guardian_contact FROM public.children_health_records WHERE health_conditions LIKE '%Asthma%';
SELECT child_name, health_conditions FROM public.children_health_records WHERE health_conditions IS NOT NULL ORDER BY child_name DESC;
SELECT vaccination_name, vaccination_date, vaccination_location, administered_by FROM public.vaccination_records WHERE vaccination_date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM children;
SELECT name, age, address FROM children ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT guardian_name, name, age FROM children WHERE age > 5;
SELECT vaccine_name, vaccination_date, nurse_name FROM vaccinations WHERE child_id = 1;
SELECT height, weight, bmi FROM health_records WHERE child_id = 2 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM children WHERE age > 10 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, age, address FROM children WHERE guardian_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM vaccinations WHERE vaccination_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY vaccine_name, vaccination_date DESC;
SELECT child_id, height, weight, bmi FROM health_records WHERE height > 120 AND weight < 50 ORDER BY bmi ASC;

SELECT c.name, v.vaccine_name, hr.height FROM children c INNER JOIN vaccinations v ON c.id = v.child_id INNER JOIN health_records hr ON c.id = hr.child_id WHERE v.vaccine_name LIKE '%Covid%' ORDER BY hr.height DESC, c.name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Children ORDER BY child_name DESC;
SELECT child_name, gender FROM Children WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT child_name, date_of_birth FROM Children WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Vaccinations WHERE administration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parents WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Children WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT child_name, date_of_birth FROM Children WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Vaccinations ORDER BY administration_date DESC;
SELECT child_name, doctor_name FROM Children c JOIN Vaccinations v ON c.child_id = v.child_id WHERE v.vaccine_name = 'Polio';
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parents p JOIN Children c ON p.parent_id = c.child_id;
SELECT * FROM children;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM children ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT c.name, v.vaccine_name, v.vaccine_date FROM children c JOIN vaccinations v ON c.id = v.child_id;
SELECT g.name, g.phone_number, a.city FROM guardians g JOIN addresses a ON g.id = a.child_id;
SELECT m.doctor_notes, m.visit_date FROM medical_history m WHERE m.visit_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM children;
SELECT id, name, date_of_birth FROM children ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT c.name, v.vaccine_name, v.vaccine_date FROM children c INNER JOIN vaccinations v ON c.id = v.child_id WHERE v.vaccine_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT g.name AS guardian_name, c.name AS child_name, a.city FROM guardians g INNER JOIN children c ON g.id = c.id INNER JOIN addresses a ON c.id = a.child_id WHERE g.name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT c.name, m.doctor_notes FROM children c LEFT JOIN medical_history m ON c.id = m.child_id WHERE m.visit_date < '2022-05-01';
